      • getQuoteById

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                value="/{quoteId}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getQuoteById​(@PathVariable
                                                            String quoteId)
        Gets a quote identified by its id.
        Parameters:
        quoteId - The quote id
        Returns:
        An HttpResponse containing the quote, if found.

      • getQuotesByCustomerName

        @RequestMapping(method=GET)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getQuotesByCustomerName​(@RequestParam("name")
                                                                       String name)
        Gets a list of quotes where the customer name contains the string 'name'
        Parameters:
        name - A fragment of the customer name field. Case is ignored.
        Returns:
        An HttpResponse containing the quotes, if found.

      • updateQuote

        @RequestMapping(method=PUT,
                value="/{quoteId}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity updateQuote​(@PathVariable
                                                           String quoteId,
                                                           @RequestBody
                                                           Quote info)
        Updates an existing quote with the data passed in.
        Parameters:
        quoteId - The quote id.
        info - The client-generated quote information containing the new data.
        Returns:
        An HttpResponse containing the quote, if found.

      • createQuote

        @RequestMapping(method=POST)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity createQuote​(@RequestBody
                                                           Quote info)
        Updates a new quote from the data passed in.
        Parameters:
        info - The client-generated quote information containing the new quote data.
        Returns:
        An HttpResponse containing the quote.

      • deleteQuote

        @RequestMapping(method=DELETE,
                value="/{quoteId}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity deleteQuote​(@PathVariable
                                                           String quoteId)
        Removes an existing quote from the system.
        Parameters:
        quoteId - The quote id.
        Returns:
        An HTTP status code
